name: cap-captcha
description: Cap is a web tool that generates, edits, and validates CAP (Common Alerting Protocol) files. It is useful in emergency systems and alert servers, with a simple visual editor and XML export.
features: CAP File Generation: Create Common Alerting Protocol files easily. Emergency ready.
Visual Editor: Simple interface for editing alert messages. No XML knowledge needed.
File Validation: Ensure CAP files meet protocol standards. Compliant alerts.
XML Export: Generate standard CAP XML files. Universal compatibility.
Emergency Systems: Useful for alert servers and emergency systems. Critical infrastructure.
Web-Based Tool: Access from any browser for alert creation. Convenient access.
